'''v0.8.0 alpha build 8''' is the seventh and final build version released for [[Pocket Edition v0.8.0 alpha|0.8.0]], as well as the final build released in 2013.

== Changes ==

'''[[Falling block]]s'''
* Now drop their item form when falling onto blocks they cannot replace, such as [[torch]]es.
'''[[Creative inventory]]'''
* All [[wool]] and [[carpet]] variants are now sorted based on their color rather than their [[Bedrock Edition data values|block data]].

'''Other'''
* Fixed double [[chest]]s becoming unpaired.
* Added back hurt and [[fire]] color overlay for [[mob]]s.
* The chest inventory now refreshes when two [[player]]s change the content at the same time.</onlyinclude>
